entry.title: The Law as Teacher | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: The Law as Teacher | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 3 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 3 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is â€œEducationâ€ and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œThe Law as Teacherâ€. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Deut. 6:5, 31:9â€“27, Rom. 3:19â€“23, Rev. 12:17, 14:12, Mark 6:25â€“27, Heb. 5:8
Memory Text: â€œYou shall love the Lord your God with all your heart, with all your soul, and with all your strengthâ€ (Deuteronomy 6:5, NKJV).
(October 10â€“October 16)
Sunday (Shelley Quinn) - â€œTo Love and to Fear Godâ€ Monday (Terry Shelton) - â€œA Witness Against Youâ€ Tuesday (Danny Shelton) - â€œThat You May Prosperâ€ Wednesday (Ryan Day) - â€œThe Toils and Struggles of Law Keepersâ€ Thursday (Jill Morikone) - â€œJesus, Our Exampleâ€
